function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased reliance on online shopping as a result of in-person shopping limitations","Impact":"Greater package delivery and movement in communities, potential for virus transmission through delivery personnel and package handling","Mitigation":"Implement contactless delivery, sanitize packages, and maintain physical distance during delivery","Technologies":"Contactless delivery systems, UV light sterilization for packages","People":"Delivery personnel, residents, community members","Owner":"Delivery companies, residents, community organizations"},{"Description":"Link between average income, age group, and virus transmission","Impact":"Certain demographic groups at higher risk for virus transmission, potential for unequal access to healthcare and resources","Mitigation":"Targeted public health interventions, access to healthcare and resources for vulnerable groups, equitable policy development","Technologies":"Data analysis for targeted interventions, telemedicine, mobile healthcare clinics","People":"Healthcare providers, policymakers, vulnerable demographic groups","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, government agencies, community organizations"},{"Description":"Challenges of stay-at-home orders in neighborhoods without public or private open spaces","Impact":"Mental and physical health challenges, potential for outdoor gatherings and non-compliance with distancing measures","Mitigation":"Creation of public spaces, promotion of outdoor activities, support for mental health resources","Technologies":"Urban planning for public spaces, community engagement apps, telehealth for mental health support","People":"Residents, community members, mental health professionals","Owner":"Local government, community organizations, mental health institutions"}]}
